title: Pleasantville
description: Pleasantville is a place of pure family values, where the high school basketball team always wins ‘em all. Spend time with George, Betty, Bud, Mary Sue, and of course, Mr. Johnson at the soda shop.
alt1: George hanging his hat on the rack by the door
alt2: Betty offers a plate of Rice Krispies squares at the table
alt4: Mr. Johnson at the soda shop
